DOC.brief_summary: That exercise will reduce anemia and fatigue, while improving aerobic capacity, strength and hematopoietic stem and progenitor cell mitochondrial function.
DOC.brief_title: Influence of Exercise on Anemia in MDS Patients
DOC.criteria: Have a confirmed diagnosis of MDS, Have approval of the study medical monitor, be able to read English, be 21 years of age or older, give informed consent Have physical limitations, be identified in the active or maintenance stage of exercise behavior
